content: this crochet pumpkin doll pattern is designed as a one-piece no-sew project with alternative instructions for sewing the limbs separately and seaming on make it your way this pattern is part of the fifth annual halloween crochet along with cal central crochet 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting flat in row crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop starting with the magic_ring embellishing with embroidery back stitch and satin stitch includes links chocolate brown cc *or approximately 80 yd 73 m in ca 10 yd 9 m in cb and 60 yd 55 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* us size g-4/4 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* locking
